thread.section_title: Woodland Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Woodland Direct | woodlanddirect.com | 3 of 93
thread.title: Larry Cowden
thread.title_full: Woodland Direct reviewed by Larry Cowden

author: Larry Cowden
title: Larry Cowden
text:
We have ordered twice now from Woodland. The fireplace screen we had made is quality work and fair priced. Looks great in front of our fireplace. The second purchase for a fire place grate was easy and they had a grate that fit our fireplace. Finding one was very hard to do.
Price and shipping very reasonable. These items should last us a lifetime.
